channel.title: Comments on: This is a Vanguard + IGE Fan Site

item.title: By: Nirvana
item.dc:creator: Nirvana
item.description:
Funny take, Chris. I thought immediatley, "What would you like on your tombstone?" and answered it with, "Sony".
Here's a beta leak that you may find enlightening that I read today. http://hgamer.blogspot.com/2006/05/vanguard-beta-in-trouble.html
It was posted on the Heartless Blogs.
item.content:encoded:
Funny take, Chris. I thought immediatley, “What would you like on your tombstone?” and answered it with, “Sony”.

Here’s a beta leak that you may find enlightening that I read today. http://hgamer.blogspot.com/2006/05/vanguard-beta-in-trouble.html

It was posted on the Heartless Blogs.

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description:
You need the magazine. It has a picture of teh sexah wood 3lf ch1ck on the cover.
w00t
I signed up for the LORTO beta. I'll get picked for stress testing [pre-sale marketing push] like everyone else. I think I'll take a pass on Vanguard, though, if only 'cause I don't have ten minutes to waste on downtime between fights. I don't believe they can bring back the "magic" of EverQuest because I don't think they understand why it worked or how to reproduce it.
item.content:encoded:
You need the magazine. It has a picture of teh sexah wood 3lf ch1ck on the cover.

w00t

I signed up for the LORTO beta. I’ll get picked for stress testing [pre-sale marketing push] like everyone else. I think I’ll take a pass on Vanguard, though, if only ’cause I don’t have ten minutes to waste on downtime between fights. I don’t believe they can bring back the “magic” of EverQuest because I don’t think they understand why it worked or how to reproduce it.

item.title: By: Finster
item.dc:creator: Finster
item.description: Sony. Where mediocre MMORPG's go to die.
item.content:encoded: Sony. Where mediocre MMORPG’s go to die.
